DOC.brief_title: Single Centre Study Determine Antibody Response G17DT Patients With Advanced Pancreatic Cancer .
DOC.detailed_description: Jaundiced patient advanced pancreatic cancer ( either locally , advance metastatic ) treat G17DT either immediately ( Group A ) , follow biliary stenting jaundice resolve ( Group B ) . Patients jaundiced time presentation enter Group B . Patients receive 3 Intramuscular injection G17DT week 0 , 1 , 3 . A booster injection offer patient measurable anit-G17Dt antibody anti-G17DT antibody fell pre-specified threshold week 23 . Patients evaluate study closure ort patient death .
DOC.criteria: Patients pancreatic adenocarcinoma ( cytologically histologically prove ) , suitable potentially curative resection . If patient jaundice , bilirubin > 80 μmol/L . Male female patient 18 year age . World Health Organization ( WHO ) performance status 0 2 . Patients life expectancy least 8 week . Patients must give write informed consent . Patients undergo potentially curative resection . Jaundiced patient bilirubin value < 80 μmol/L . Patients consider fit endoscopic percutaneous biliary stenting . Patients receive anticancer therapy . History malignant disease except nonmelanomatous skin cancer situ carcinoma cervix . Females pregnant , plan become pregnant , lactate . Patients take part another study involve investigational license drug device three month precede enrolment study . Previous G17DT treatment . Haematological indicator : Haemoglobin ( Hb ) < 10.0 g/dL . White cell count ( WCC ) < 4.0×109/L . Platelets < 100×109/L .
